name: GIVE MORE THAN YOU TAKE - Memento
description: "GIVE MORE THAN YOU TAKE" is the first collective NFT made by the NFT community for the environment. The main QR Code, showing the name of the project, is made up by all the messages collected by the NFT community (artists, collectors and enthusiasts) converted into QR Codes. Use your smartphone to explore the artwork and read all the messages sent by the participants!  The proceeds have been donated to Treedom, an organization planting trees around the world, as decided by the participants themselves of the project through a survey. You can find all the information about the project at the following website: https://qrtcodes.wixsite.com/home/charity ! The main NFT is available on Opensea while this one is a memento, minted in 231 editions (as the number of participants), to allow the participants to have something reminding them the participation to this awesome project.
